basics.name: Jus Recondo
basics.label: Front End Developer with +3 years of experience building interfaces with JavaScript, HTML, CSS and React.
basics.summary: I enjoy translating designs into code and participate in the design process working closely with the UX/UI team. I have solid skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React, so I can quickly learn new technologies and tools. In addition to that, my teaching experience has helped me boost my communication and teamwork skills.
